name: .FFE File Extension
summary: Learn about .FFE files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open, create, and edit FFE files in DirectX Force Editor, and you can play FFE files using DirectX ReadFFE. These applications were included in previous versions of the DirectX SDK. The DirectX 9 SDK is the last version that included Force Editor and ReadFFE.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
